# FormPlus

interface Props{
    config: Config;
    children?: React.ReactElement;
    submit?: React.ReactElement | ({form})=>React.ReactElement
    defaultData?: { [name: string]: any };
    setForm?: (form: any) => void;
}
<FormPlus
    config={demoConfig}
    defaultData={{
       DomainName: 'haha',
       Type: '2',
    }}
    setForm={(form) => {
        console.log(form);
    }}
    submit={
        <PageSubmit
        onSubmit={(ok: boolean, data: any) => {
            console.log(ok, data);
        }}
        submitLabel="Add Domain"
        />
    }
>

Config 配置请看这里

# FormToPage

interface Props {
  children: React.ReactElement;
  backClick?: () => void;
  title?: string;
}
<FormToPage
  backClick={() => {
    alert();
  }}
  title="Add Domain"
>
  <FormPlus
    config={demoConfig}
    setForm={form => {
      console.log(form);
    }}
    submit={<CustomSubmit />}
  >
    <h1>other context</h1>
  </FormPlus>
</FormToPage>;

# PageSubmit

interface Props {
  form?: any;
  onSubmit: (ok: boolean, data: any, form: any) => void;
  submitLabel: string;
  submitLoading?: boolean;
}
<FormToPage
  backClick={() => {
    alert();
  }}
  title="Add Domain"
>
  <FormPlus
    config={demoConfig}
    setForm={form => {
      console.log(form);
    }}
    submit={
      <PageSubmit
        onSubmit={(ok: boolean, data: any) => {
          console.log(ok, data);
        }}
        submitLabel="Add Domain"
      />
    }
  >
    <h1>other context</h1>
  </FormPlus>
</FormToPage>;

# ModalSubmit

interface Props {
  form?: any;
  onSubmit: (ok: boolean, data: any, form: any) => void;
  onCancel: () => void;
  submitLabel: string;
  submitLoading?: boolean;
}
<FormToModal
  visible={visible}
  onClose={() => {
    setVisible(false);
  }}
  title="Add Domain"
>
  <FormPlus
    config={modalDemoConfig}
    submit={
      <ModalSubmit
        onSubmit={(ok: boolean, data: any) => {
          console.log(ok, data);
        }}
        onCancel={() => {
          alert('onCancel');
        }}
        submitLabel="Add Domain"
      />
    }
  >
    <h1>other context</h1>
  </FormPlus>
</FormToModal>;
